Description:
Viking died in battle and was cursed, and now he is forced to wander forever through endless dungeons in search of a way and revenge. The way he waylaid dangerous monsters, and ahead of the unexplored depths of the stone labyrinths. Will the hero get? Walk on the locations, kill monsters and grow stronger, using all kinds of magical potions.
